description: This file declares the 'Request' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which appears to be a representation of a JSON-RPC Request message used in WebSocket communications. It includes methods for creating requests, retrieving the request ID, and converting the request to a string. The class manages request IDs using a static atomic counter.

classes.name: Request
classes.description: A class representing a JSON-RPC request message for WebSocket communication, capable of creating requests and managing request IDs.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new request with the specified method name and parameters.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the request.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Converts the request to its string (JSON) representation.

methods.name: generateId
methods.description: Generates a unique ID for each request, implemented using an atomic counter.
